description: The Contract will be in effect for one (1) year with three (3) additional one (1) year option periods.
full_summary:
### 2 Billion Trees Digital Solution Tender Announcement
#### Tender Information
* **Procurement Number:** PW-23-01025477
* **Publication Date:** February 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 27, 2023, 1:00 PM ET
* **Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Tender Description
The Government of Canada is soliciting proposals for the 2 Billion Trees Digital Solution, a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) project under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The contract will be in effect for one year with three additional one-year option periods.

#### Key Requirements and Deliverables
* The successful bidder will provide TBIPS services to support the development of the 2 Billion Trees Digital Solution project.
* Services will include, but are not limited to:
	+ Development of a digital platform to support the 2 Billion Trees initiative
	+ Integration with existing systems and data sources
	+ User interface design and development
	+ Testing and deployment

#### Eligibility and Selection Criteria
* Eligible bidders must be registered vendors with Natural Resources Canada.
* The selection criteria are as follows:
	+ Experience in delivering TBIPS projects similar in scope and complexity
	+ Demonstrated expertise in developing digital solutions for government clients
	+ Ability to meet the project timelines and deliverables

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Other trade agreements listed in the tender document

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the complete RFP package, are available on the CanadaBuys website.

#### Contacts
For more information, please contact Nidhi Nigam, Contracting Officer, at (587) 337-3877 or [nidhi.nigam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca](mailto:nidhi.nigam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca).
